chapters.title: Early Graffiti Days
chapters.description: KAWS began his career on the streets, turning public spaces into living canvases. His graffiti tag became an iconic symbol of rebellion and creativity.
chapters.quote: Street walls were my first galleries.

chapters.title: The Rise of Companion
chapters.description: The “Companion” character became a pop-culture icon — a reflection of vulnerability and humanity hidden behind cartoonish expressions.
chapters.quote: Companion represents empathy, sadness, and the comfort of shared emotion.

chapters.title: KAWS x Dior
chapters.description: In collaboration with Dior, KAWS merged high fashion and street art, blending playfulness with sophistication through color and texture.
chapters.quote: Art doesn’t belong to one world — it belongs to everyone.

chapters.title: The Legacy Continues
chapters.description: KAWS continues to inspire a new generation — reminding us that art can live beyond walls, on toys, fashion, and digital screens.
chapters.quote: KAWS continues to inspire a new generation — reminding us that art can live beyond walls, on toys, fashion, and digital screens.
